article.title: Raytheon ELCAN Optical Technologies Awarded up to $180 Million for Marine Corps Enhanced Thermal Imaging Program
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Raytheon Company has been awarded a single-source, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract worth up to $180 million from the U.S. Navy to procure, deliver, maintain and provide logistical support to the Medium Range Thermal Bi-Ocular program.
